after i had left the radio host called me a day or so later and said he beleived me that i would not have went threw all that trouble to tell a lie. i now it was a flyin saucer, i,m not stupid. i am a father of two , have been married 15 years , am a leading superviser in a major construction company and i am not a lyer. i see all theese shows of people seeing lighs but i seen a real ship. please , i wish for an official credited lie detecter test or to be hipnotised to show the truth. i know what i saw.!!!!!!!!
